content: You are Antonio. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Antonio ., Antonio  just said to you: '"Right then, wage payment done. Feels good to get that sorted!"' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Excellent! Glad to hear it, Antonio. A happy workforce is a productive one!"

You are Antonio. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Antonio ., Antonio  just said to you: '"Right then, that’s the wage payment sorted. Finally! Feels good to get that done."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Excellent! Glad to hear it, Antonio. A weight off both our shoulders, eh?"
